Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: SA
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my Cannon SX230hs. Battery works great, screen protector has to be custom cut but had no problem. Had a lot of extra screen protector to use in future for anything else. And the tripod sits fine. Be careful though with the minitripod because the large lens on the camera shifts the center of gravity. Great bundle for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good & useful package
Reviews.Author: bnrd 01/06/2013
Reviews.Content: I bought this package NB5L for my Canon 230HS.Protectors for display was prettyeasy installed and were very useful in future.All rest items I still didn`tuse,but I think it also need to have.

ProductInfo.Features:
NB-5L Rechargeable Lithium Ion Replacement Battery
Mini Table Top Tripod
Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
(See Description for Compatible Models)
ProductInfo.Name: NB5L Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Canon Powershot SX230HS SX210IS SX200IS Digital Cameras DavisMAX Bundle
